scripts:
set properties on /content/dam/shrss/jcr:content
  set cq:conf{String} to /conf/shrss
  set jcr:title{String} to "Hard Rock Seminole"
end

create service user shrss-service-user
 set ACL on /etc/acs-commons/lists
 allow jcr:read for shrss-service-user
 allow jcr:write for shrss-service-user
end
